short_description: This function is used to create partial recommendation scores for users for each item.
long_description: This function is used to create partial recommendation scores for users for each item.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the user_table column that contains the unique user identifiers. The default value is 'usr'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the user_table column that contains the unique user identifiers. The default value is 'usr'.

argument_clauses.name: UserItem
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the user_table column that contains the names of the items that the user viewed or purchased. The default value is 'item'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the user_table column that contains the names of the items that the user viewed or purchased. The default value is 'item'.

argument_clauses.name: UserPref
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the user_table column that contains user preferences for an item, expressed as numeric values. The value 0 indicates no preference. The default value is 'preference'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the user_table column that contains user preferences for an item, expressed as numeric values. The value 0 indicates no preference. The default value is 'preference'.

argument_clauses.name: item1
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the item_table column that contains the first item (item1). The default value is 'col1_item1'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the item_table column that contains the first item (item1). The default value is 'col1_item1'.

argument_clauses.name: item2
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the item_table column that contains the second item (item2). The default value is 'col1_item2'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the item_table column that contains the second item (item2). The default value is 'col1_item2'.

argument_clauses.name: ItemSimilarity
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the item_table column that contains the similarity score for item1 and item2. The default value is 'cntb'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the item_table column that contains the similarity score for item1 and item2. The default value is 'cntb'.

argument_clauses.name: AccumulateItem
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of item_table columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of item_table columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: AccumulateUser
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of user_table columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of user_table columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: SequenceInputBy
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the LIST_VECTOR of column(s) that uniquely identifies each row of the input argument INPUT_ARG_NAME. The argument is used to ensure deterministic results for functions which produce results that vary from run to run.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input column(s) that uniquely identify each row of input table. The format is 'input1:c1' where input1 refers to the alias used by the input table that contains such column named c1.
